application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of a Basement Impact Assessment and Sustainable Drainage Strategy pursuant to condition 13 of planning permission ref: 231554VAR dated 15/06/2023 for: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition 2 (approved plans), to incorporate variations to the internal layouts and external elevations, in relation to planning permission reference 222769FUL dated 26/01/2023 for: Conversion of building into 7 self-contained flats; two storey side extension; single storey front porch extension, with light wells and balustrading to front elevation; lowering of existing basement floor; creation of four balconies to the rear elevation; extensions to main roof, including raising roof ridge height and five dormer windows, rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of four roof lights to front roof slopes; window, fenestration and brickwork replacement and restoration; and associated parking, refuse and recycling storage and hard and soft landscaping
